title: Did Rush Limbo say that about Liberally vs. Conservatives' Pity Opinions?
subtitle: The statement was part of an updated list of "35 undeniable facts" presented in the Rush Limbo radio programme in February 1994.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Rush Limbo once said: "The liberals measure mercy by the number of people being cared for. The conservatives measure mercy by the number of people who no longer need it.
